titleStmt.title: An invitation to a solemn day of humiliation (viz. the third day of the seventh moneth, 57.) to the Lords people in the three nations who are sensible of the great dishonour of God; and desire to approve themselves faithfull to God and his work in this day of division and apostacy.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Livewell Chapman, and are to be sold at the Crown in Popes-head-alley,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Clem. Ireton [and 7 others].
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
